By: Mohammed Amine Malloul \n fd Number: fdai7691 Insert Retrieve Name: Sign Up Chats New Chat About CampusChat is a versatile chat application for Android, designed to make communication within the campus community easy, secure, and engaging. It features text and multimedia messaging, powered by Firebase for robust and real-time interactions. Ideal for both one-on-one and group conversations, CampusChat offers a platform that caters to both individual and collaborative communication needs.
